Name: Active
Description: The asset is currently in use and fully functional. It is part of the organization's daily operations and is available for use without restrictions.

Name: Inactive
Description: The asset is not currently in use, but it is still functional. It may be placed in storage or awaiting reassignment or further decision about its future use.

Name: Under Maintenance
Description: The asset is undergoing repairs or maintenance and is temporarily unavailable for use. It is expected to return to active status once maintenance is completed.

Name: Pending Approval
Description: The asset is awaiting administrative approval for certain actions, such as being placed into service, transferred, or disposed of.

Name: Decommissioned
Description: The asset has reached the end of its useful life and has been formally removed from active service. It may be retained for parts or disposed of permanently.

Name: Loaned
Description: The asset has been temporarily provided to another department, organization, or individual under a loan agreement. It is expected to be returned after the loan period ends.

Name: Lost
Description: The asset has been reported stolen and is no longer in the organization's possession. Legal or recovery actions may be pursued.

Name: Reserved
Description: The asset is set aside for future use or a specific purpose. It is not currently in active service but is designated for a specific task or project.

Name: Under Inspection
Description: The asset is undergoing inspection or audit to determine its condition or verify its usage. It is temporarily unavailable until the inspection is complete.

Name: Transferred
Description: The asset has been moved from one branch, department, or location to another. It is still active but is being used in a different part of the organization.

Name: Damaged
Description: The asset has sustained damage and is either partially functional or non-functional. Repairs may be pending or the asset might be awaiting disposal.

Name: Retired
Description: The asset is no longer in active use but remains within the organization for historical purposes, record-keeping, or non-operational roles.

Name: Quarantined
Description: The asset has been flagged due to potential safety or compliance issues and is isolated from use until further evaluation or repair.

Name: Awaiting Disposal
Description: The asset is no longer required or useful to the organization and is awaiting disposal. This could include sale, donation, or scrapping.
